title: A good set, too

author: hustla187
title: Orange Overkill
review: This is a good idea to make a smaller RC car, but it doesn't really impress me. It looks too juniored up as what Lego town was back in the late 90s. The orange color gives the RC an nice color, but there's too much orange. Get the Dirt Crusher instead.
